text:
@BorisJohnson Morning 
Dear PM

In Japan 🇯🇵 
Governments are contemplating to take steps to help fight the COVID-19 since the second spread has appeared earlier than we anticipated. 

Despite we wear a face mask under any circumstances.....

Kazun , Kyoto Japan 🇯🇵 

Faithfully yours

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
